title: Verizon bringing its 5G UW network to iPhone users in more cities this year
content:
Verizon is bringing its 5G Ultra Wideband network to users in more US cities this year. The telecommunications giant is in agreements with satellite providers to gain early access to the additional C-band spectrum it acquired in 2021.

moreâ€¦

The post Verizon bringing its 5G UW network to iPhone users in more cities this year appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Ahead of schedule, Verizon is bringing its 5G Ultra Wideband network to iPhone users in more U.S. cities this year.
